verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] getting heavy criticism from religious authorities for its immigration policies , particularly the separation of families on the border . Jeff Sessions tried to defend them with a Bible quotation . It was a bad idea .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: getting] [ARG1: heavy criticism] [ARG2: from religious authorities] [ARGM-CAU: for its immigration policies , particularly the separation of families on the border] . Jeff Sessions tried to defend them with a Bible quotation . It was a bad idea .

The Trump administration is getting heavy criticism from religious authorities for its immigration policies , particularly the separation of families on the border . [ARG0: Jeff Sessions] [V: tried] [ARG1: to defend them with a Bible quotation] . It was a bad idea .

The Trump administration is getting heavy criticism from religious authorities for its immigration policies , particularly the separation of families on the border . [ARG0: Jeff Sessions] tried to [V: defend] [ARG1: them] [ARGM-MNR: with a Bible quotation] . It was a bad idea .

The Trump administration is getting heavy criticism from religious authorities for its immigration policies , particularly the separation of families on the border . Jeff Sessions tried to defend them with a Bible quotation . [ARG1: It] [V: was] [ARG2: a bad idea] .
